name: Maze Escape Craft: Build Block FREE
name_original: Maze Escape Craft: Build Block FREE
description:
You shall not pass! Unless you build the road using special blocks.

Welcome to the extremely interesting and challenging logic quest - Maze Escape Craft: Build Block FREE! You have to find the exit from some strange labyrinth. There are a lot of dangerous abysses and challenges, and nobody can help you. Maze escape is one of the most famous entertainment, and now you can try it. Seems too easy?

To cross the abyss, you have to build a bridge using special blocks. Feel like a real builder, use your blocks wisely and you’ll pass the level!

Maze Escape Craft: Build Block FREE GAME FEATURES:
- Try to escape from a labyrinth - success depends on you;
- Use special blocks to complete the construction of the level;
- Different levels – try to solve every quest;
- Unusual cool graphics;
- Interesting logic puzzle for everyone.

Maze Escape Craft: Build Block FREE – you can be a builder, you can be a survivor, you can be a runner! Just enjoy this adventure quest and have fun.
